name: Corona Run
description:
Corona virus has hit your small rural town and all your former friends and neighbors now resent you for being the only one to not yet contract the disease... They have now all joined together in an attempt to infect you with the infamous disease. Can you outrun this intimidating Conga line of DEATH ?

Controls - Wasd/Arrows, escape is to pause the game and I made this pretty experimental dash mechanic that can be used by pressing the space bar.

Tile map used - Tiny RPG Town

This is my first ever game and this wasn't quite my original vision for the final product but I thought this still turned out to be pretty fun to play and I might try to recreate this game at a later date :) comment what your best time was and have a safe quarantine everybody.
